heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions 
Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments to General Practitioners) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2025.

heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the Public Service
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the Public Service 
Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments to General Practitioners) 
Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 692 of 2019).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean public service pay pension act 2017 (section 42) (payments general practitioners) regulation 2019 (s.i no 692 2019)

title: Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017), being satisfied that subsection (6) of that section has
heading: 3. Regulation 3 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion of
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion of 

the following definitions: 

“ ‘MMRV vaccine’ means a vaccine against Measles, Mumps, Rubella and 
Varicella; 

‘Varicella vaccine’ means a vaccine against the Varicella zoster virus;”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 3 principal regulation amended insertion following definition mmrv vaccine mean vaccine measles mumps rubella varicella varicella vaccine mean vaccine varicella zoster virus

title: Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017), being satisfied that subsection (6) of that section has
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 
(Section 42) (Payments to General Practitioners) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 692 
of 2019) to provide fees for General Practitioners for the provision of 
vaccinations under a new Primary Childhood Immunisation Programme 
schedule which includes the administration of the Varicella vaccine.
